item.trans: adv. 明显地；无疑地，确实地 同义词:obviously, clearly, easily, strictly, no doubt She now distinctly saw two or three figures already so near to her , that a precipitate flight would have been equally fruitless and impolitic .她现在能够看清两三个人影已经离她不远，再要仓促逃跑不仅是徒劳，而且未免失策了。
adj. 习惯的；通常的 n. 习惯法汇编 同义词:usual, used, common, accustomed The people were probably governed by the customary Semitic law of the desert .人们很可能是受荒芜时代的犹太人习惯法的约束。
vt. 隔离，使孤立；使绝缘，使隔热 同义词:segregant, quarantine to insulate oneself from the outside world与外部世界隔绝

n. 相似；相似之处；相似物；肖像 同义词:image, conformity, likeness It is always going to be an approximate picture but he insists there is a " strong resemblance " with what happens in reality .这永远只会是一种大致的描述，但他坚称这与实际情况“非常相似”。
vt. 压；按；逼迫；紧抱 vi. 压；逼；重压 n. 压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机 同义词:push, hug, clic, news bulletin Press this button to start the engine.要开动发动机就按这个按钮。
vi. 跳跃；跳绳；遗漏；跳读 vt. 跳过；遗漏 n. 跳跃；跳读 同义词:dance, to leap, jump, clear, jump, spring to skip about跳来跳去
n. 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆 vt. 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露 vi. 照射；堆满笑容 同义词:ray, stream, to transmit, send out, irradiate We beamed the X-rays through the material.我们用X射线透视物质。
n. 别墅；郊区住宅 同义词:country seat, chateau Another thing you have to consider is whether you want a villa .还有一点你要考虑的是：你想买别墅呢。
n. 灶台；炉边；炉床；壁炉地面 同义词:cooking bench, ingleside I suppose this resemblance disarmed Mr. Heathcilff : he walked to the hearth in evident agitation .我猜想这种相象使希刺克厉夫缓和了：他显然很激动地走到炉边。
n. 焦油；柏油；水手 vt. 涂以焦油；玷污 同义词:asphalt, tarre, cloud, pollute They're tarring the lampposts.他们正在用柏油涂料涂抹路灯柱。

adj. 重大的；有效的；有意义的；值得注意的；意味深长的 n. 象征；有意义的事物 同义词:valid, important, available, effective, virtual, remarkable, symbol, indication Even so , the gains from the victory of 1902 were significant indeed .即使如此，从1902年胜利取得的收获的确是重要的。

adj. 客观的；目标的；宾格的 n. 目的；目标；[光] 物镜；宾格 同义词:impersonal, accusatival, intention, purpose, sake, target, goal Objective To study the relationship between bronchial asthma and tuberculin reaction .目的研究支气管哮喘与结核菌素反应之间的关系。
adj. 邻近的；附近的；接壤的 同义词:adjacent, surrounding Two countries are neighbouring if their boundaries have an edge in common .如果两个国家的边界有公共边，则说它们是相邻的。
n. 推进；推进力 同义词:drive, pulsion But magnetic propulsion has some drawbacks .但是磁力推进有一些缺陷。
n. 抵消，补偿；平版印刷；支管 vt. 抵消；弥补；用平版印刷术印刷 vi. 装支管 同义词:compensation, indemnity, kill, recover The gains offset the losses.收支相抵。
n. 声调，语调；语音的抑扬 同义词:parlance The underlined expressions have a rising intonation .划线的部分语调升高。
adj. 不完全的；[计] 不完备的 同义词:half, synsemantic Therefore our knowledge of the core is quite incomplete .因此我们对地核的认识还非常不全面。
n. 徽章；证章；标记 vt. 授给…徽章 同义词:marks, bedge The big Irishman with the Immigration badge looked at him .那个带着移民局证章的大个子爱尔兰人瞧着他。
n. 圆屋顶 vi. 成圆顶状 vt. 加圆屋顶于…上 同义词:cupola His forehead domed out in a curve.他的前额呈半球形凸起。
n. 活力；气势 同义词:vitality, energy, spring Would a French company have been pursued with such vigour ?难道微软公司会如此青睐这样一个法国公司？
n. 意识；知觉；觉悟；感觉 同义词:feel, aesthesia Other warning signs include losing consciousness or becoming dizzy and weak .其他警告信号还包括失去知觉或眩晕、虚弱乏力。
vt. 限制；使具有资格；证明…合格 vi. 取得资格，有资格 同义词:block, set a limit to, be in a position, be qualified to His skills qualify him for the work.他的技能使他能担当这项工作。
vt. 维护，坚持；断言；主张；声称 同义词:maintain, say, submit, stay, advocate She asserted that she was innocent.她坚称自己清白无辜。
adj. 三角的，[数] 三角形的；三人间的 同义词:trigonal, three-cornered Many deltas are triangular in shape.很多三角洲是三角形的。
n. 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望 vt. 相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂 同义词:faith, reputation, honor, loan, confidence, put faith in, believe in I didn't credit that absurd tale.我不相信那个荒谬绝伦的故事。
n. 壳，贝壳；炮弹；外形 vi. 剥落；设定命令行解释器的位置 vt. 剥皮；炮轰 同义词:configuration, profile, shot, chip, flake off, skin, flay to shell peas剥豌豆
n. 崇拜；礼拜；尊敬 vt. 崇拜；尊敬；爱慕 vi. 拜神；做礼拜 同义词:respect, church, praise, exercise, honor, love, regard, go to church to worship reverently虔诚地崇拜
adj. 无关紧要的 同义词:indifferent, small-beer On the other hand, even in the pro -whaling countries , whaling is an insignificant and dying industry .另一方面，甚至在“倾捕”的国家里，捕鲸也只是个无足轻重、日薄西山的行业。

n. 弦；和弦 同义词:hypothenuse, quadrature Sometimes when you play , you hit a note or chord , and your facial and body expressions contort to match the audio expression .有时当你演奏时，你击出一个音符或和弦，你的面部和身体表情会扭曲以配合听觉的表达。
n. 压力；压迫，[物] 压强 vt. 迫使；密封；使……增压 同义词:heat, compression force, reduce to, compel to pressure someone into doing something迫使某人做某事
n. 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物 同义词:synthetic, songwriting He crossed off the needless words in his composition .他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了。
n. 新奇；新奇的事物；新颖小巧而廉价的物品 同义词:newness, originality Riding was novelty to her .骑马对她来说是件新鲜事。
n. 签证 vt. 签发签证 同义词:vise Now , Plan C . In your pocket you'll find an envelope , a passport , a visa , the money .现在开始C计划。在你的口袋里有一个信封，里面有一本护照、签证和钱。
vt. 拍击；侮辱；掌击；掴…的耳光 n. 掴；侮辱；掌击；拍打声 vi. 掴；拍击 adv. 直接地；猛然地；恰好 同义词:make a chump out of, insult, despite, indignity, spank, directly, immediately, straight, just, fair to slap the door拍门
adj. 传教的；传教士的 n. 传教士 同义词:Boanerges, preacher His coat was a good one, and his black tie was a gift from a kind missionary on Thanksgiving Day .他的西装上衣算蛮好的，他那条黑领带是感恩节那天一个好心的传教士送给他的礼物。
n. 博览会；阐述；展览会 同义词:expansion, exhibition, fair It can be said that Cuture Industry Exposition is the representation for the consumption of the popular culture .文化产业博览会可以说是对大众文化的消费主义表现行式。
n. 冶金；冶金学；冶金术 Abstract : Rotary mixer is used in mixing and granulating si nter for ferrous and nonferrous metallurgy .文摘：圆筒混合机主要用于钢铁和有色金属冶炼烧结物料的混合和制粒作业。
adj. 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的 vt. 仔细考虑；商议 同义词:intended, studied, designed, contained, conscious, negotiate, mull over to deliberate a question思考问题
n. 规格；说明书；详述 同义词:description, amplification He now had an expertly detailed specification .现在他有了精细的规格说明。
adv. 随后，其后；后来 同义词:after, since South African officials said part of their border with Zimbabwe was subsequently a "disaster area ".南非官员说部分与津巴布韦接壤的地区随后已经被确定为疫区。
adj. 成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的 vi. 成熟；到期 vt. 使…成熟；使…长成；慎重作出 同义词:developed, adult, due, age, flower She matured earlier than him.她比他成熟得早。
n. 果酱；拥挤；困境；[篮球]扣篮 vt. 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎 vi. 堵塞；轧住 He jammed his clothes into a black suitcase.他把衣服塞进了一只黑手提箱。
vi. 刺，捅；戳；伸出；刺探；闲荡 vt. 刺，捅；戳；拨开 n. 戳；刺；袋子；懒汉 同义词:moon, run through, stick, pink, soldier, spine Be careful not to poke someone in the eye with your umbrella.注意别把伞戳着别人的眼睛。

n. 虾；小虾；矮小的人 vi. 捕虾 adj. 有虾的；虾制的 同义词:small, crevette, prawn Larger migratory include the shrimp -like krill , animals that resemble small shell -less snails and jellyfish , and other fascinating creatures .大的迁移者有虾状的磷虾，还有无壳的蜗牛和水母等动物，还有一些其他奇怪的生物。
n. 装配，装置；试穿，试衣 adj. 适合的，适宜的；相称的 同义词:assembly, device, apparatus, installation, unit, adaptive, calculated, matching, well, worthy Drink unfits a man for work.饮酒使人不能工作。
n. 威严；最高权威，王权；雄伟；权威 同义词:authority, crown Attention! The Duke of Vendome presents Joan the Maid to Majesty .静一静！凡多姆公爵引导少女贞德朝见陛下！
adj. 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的 v. 注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词） 同义词:famous, obvious, prominent, marked, outstanding to note a case对一桩案子做笔录
n. 刀具，切割机；切割者；裁剪者 同义词:bit tool, dicing saw You should never put cutter * swob or other project into the ear canal .任何情况下你都不可以把海绵或其它东西塞入耳道。
n. 合力；结果；[化学] 生成物 adj. 结果的；合成的 同义词:outcome, product, event, consequence, harvest, complex, synthetic This determinant is a special case of the resultant of two polynomials.这个行列式是两个行列式的结式的特殊情形。

vt. 嘲弄；模仿；使…失望；使…无效 vi. 嘲弄，嘲笑 n. 嘲弄；仿制品；嘲笑对象 adj. 模拟的；假装的；伪造的 adv. 虚伪地 同义词:guy, simulate, pattern, imitate, make game of, jeer at, derisiveness, imitation, affected, false, assumed, simulate, lyingly, falsely She mocked him as a country boy.她嘲笑他是个乡下孩子。

n. 男爵；大亨；巨头 同义词:tycoon, big boy Most of Smith's opponents were French or French - speaking , including the philosopher Etienne Bonnot de Condillac and Baron de Montesquieu .斯密大多数的对手不是法国人就是讲法语，包括哲学家艾蒂安•博诺特•德•孔狄亚克和孟德斯鸠男爵。
n. 坚定；坚固；坚度 同义词:stability, steel, durability He reshuffled the cabinet to firm his government.他改组内阁以强化其政府。
n. 交易者；商人；商船 同义词:bargainer, dealer He is a free trader .他是一位自由贸易者。
vt. 刺，戳；刺伤，刺痛；竖起 n. 刺，扎；刺痛，刺伤；阴茎；锥 vi. 刺；竖起 adj. 竖起的 同义词:cut, pink, smart, thorn, stick up, run through, cocked The child pricked the balloon and it burst.那孩子在气球上刺了个洞，气球就爆了。
n. 下属，下级；部属，属下 adj. 从属的；次要的 vt. 使……居下位；使……服从 同义词:inferior, underling, dependent, secondary, supporting, minor, peripheral to be subordinated in an office在事务所中任次职
n. 假装；骗子；赝品 vt. 假装；冒充 vi. 假装；佯装 adj. 假的；虚假的；假装的 同义词:simulation, fraud, acting, sharp, simulate, come, act, fox, affected, assumed, simulate to sham Scotch whisky造假苏格兰威士忌酒
n. 朋友，伙伴；同志 vi. 结为朋友 同义词:friend, partner, fellow, comrade He often pals around with the kid next door.他经常与邻居家的孩子结伴玩耍
vt. 残杀；彻底击败 n. 大屠杀；惨败 同义词:mow down, holocaust, bloodbath News came in of the massacre in Rwanda .关于大屠杀的新闻在卢旺达流行起来。
vt. 拿，扛；携带；支持；搬运 vi. 能达到；被携带；被搬运 n. 运载；[计] 进位；射程 同义词:encourage, have, hand, second, back, cannon-shot She carried her baby on her back.她把婴儿背在背上。
n. 变形；[物] 失真；扭曲；曲解 同义词:deformation, transformation Mining companies say the so-called distortion is in fact a strength .采矿公司阵营表示这种所谓的扭曲实际上是加强了。
n. 沉思；冥想 vt. 沉思；沉思地说 vi. 沉思；凝望 同义词:reflection, meditation, meditate on, be deep in thought, meditate on, be deep in thought She mused on what she has heard.她仔细考虑自己听到的事。
adj. 空的；无效的；无人的 n. 空虚；空间；空隙 vt. 使无效；排放 同义词:empty, hollow, useless, bare, vacant, vacuum, room, clearance, blank, emptiness, invalidate, nullify to void a check使支票无效
n. 身体；主体；大量；团体；主要部分 vt. 赋以形体 同义词:person, lots of, wealth, ocean, sea, organization, community She bodied forth the immortal mind.她使不朽的精神更具体化了。
adj. 气动的；充气的；有气胎的 n. 气胎 同义词:air-actuated, aerated Food will be served hot or cold to private houses in pneumatic tubes or automobile wagons.热食或冷食将透过气动管或外送汽车送到私人住宅。
n. [物] 极性；两极；对立 同义词:antagonism, opponency Objective To reestablish cell polarity of hepatocytes cultured in vitro .目的使培养肝细胞在体外重建细胞极性。
adj. 愠怒的，不高兴的；（天气）阴沉的；沉闷的 同义词:heavy, mumpish The hills seemed rolled in sullen mist .山峦好象在阴沉的雾里翻腾。
adj. 周围的；外界的；环绕的 n. 周围环境 同义词:environmental, surrounding, mise en scene Ambient noise may come from any direction .外界噪声可以来自任意方向。
adv. 仅仅，勉强；几乎不；公开地；贫乏地 同义词:merely, simply, just, only, but The price like this barely cover our cost .这个价格仅能勉强支付成本而已。
n. 针脚，线迹；一针 vt. 缝，缝合 vi. 缝，缝合 同义词:steek, seam, oversew, sew up to stitch two sacks together to make a curtain把两块麻袋片缝在一起权充窗帘
vt. 攫取；霸占；将…深深吸引 vi. 攫取；夺取 n. 攫取；霸占；夺取之物 同义词:pounce at, commandeer, pounce at, snatch up, arrogation He grabbed her arm and pulled her out of the path of the car.他抓住了她的胳膊，把她拉出了车道。
n. 微波 同义词:wavelet Never microwave egg in the shell.勿将带壳的鸡蛋放入微波炉内加热。
n. 学士；单身汉；（尚未交配的）小雄兽 The young bachelor will soon be taking a wife .那年轻的单身汉不久就会娶太太。
n. 绰号；昵称 vt. 给……取绰号；叫错名字 同义词:sobriquet, agname We always nickname him “Little Lazy Cat”.我们总是叫他的绰号“小懒猫”。
adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭 同义词:out If we continue to destroy the countryside many more animals will become extinct .我们若继续破坏自然环境，将会有更多的动物绝种。
n. 旋律；歌曲；美妙的音乐 同义词:song, cantus It is a melody that he sings to you .他唱给你的是一个美的旋律。
vt. 使嗡嗡叫；暗中散布 vi. 作嗡嗡声；东奔西忙 n. 嗡嗡声 同义词:zoom The telephone buzzed.电话发出嗞嗞呼叫声。
adj. 未婚的，处女的；初次的 n. 少女；处女 同义词:unwed, virgin, damoiselle, jill One day he ordered his son Hephaestus to build an image of a beautiful maiden out of clay .一天，他命令他的儿子赫菲斯托斯用粘土塑造了一个美丽的少女。
vt. 移植；迁移；使移居 n. 移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者 vi. 移植；迁移；移居 同义词:remove, transfer of culture, implantation, engraftment, remove, move I transplanted those flowers to the garden.我把那些花移植到花园里。
vt. 使加深；使强烈；使低沉 vi. 变深；变低沉 Larger ships will be able to navigate the river after the main channel is deepened.主要河床被挖深后，较大船舶将能航行于此河流。
adv. 往南地；在南方 These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall .这些鸟春天向北移栖，秋天向南移栖。
adv. 普遍地；人人；到处 同义词:generally, everywhere, around, throughout, about To date , none of these proposals has been universally accepted .但迄今为止，没有任何一个提案被普遍采纳。
vt. 强调；在…下面划线；预告 n. 下划线；下期节目预告 同义词:emphasize, stress, highlight to underline a sentence在一个句子的下面画线
vt. 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定 n. 废除；撤销 同义词:yield, desert, negative, abolish, abolition, destoolment He believes that death penalty will be repealed sooner or later.他相信死刑早晚会被废除。
n. 压缩，浓缩；压榨，压迫 同义词:concentration, pressure, hitting Stenosis may be caused by cicatricial tissue or by compression .食道狭窄可由斑痕组织或压迫所引起。
vi. 融合；熔化，熔融 vt. 使融合；使熔化，使熔融 n. 保险丝，熔线；导火线，雷管 同义词:flux, melt down, melt, flux, signal, safety wire Copper and zinc are fused to make brass.铜与锌熔合后形成黄铜。
vt. 使黯然失色；形成蚀 n. 日蚀，月蚀；黯然失色 The moon eclipses the sun.日食(或：月球遮住太阳)。
n. 基督徒，信徒 adj. 基督教的；信基督教的 All of the schools are Christian .所有的学院学生都是基督徒。
n. 超过，超额；过度，过量；无节制 adj. 额外的，过量的；附加的 同义词:immoderation, exorbitance, additional, added, attached, extra, plus It would export excess supply , instead .相反，它将输出过度的供应。
n. 电缆；海底电报 vt. 打电报 vi. 打海底电报 同义词:electrical conduit, electric line Their fishing boats were cabled together before the storm came.暴风雨降临前，他们的渔船都用缆绳系在一起。
n. [数] 相关，关联；相互关系 同义词:relationship, associations, relevance As every science student is taught from the beginning , correlation is not causation .因为每个学科学的学生一开始就学习了关联不是因果关系。

n. 腔；洞，凹处 同义词:recession, hole It occupies the central cavity of bone .它位于骨骼中央的骨髓腔里。
n. 肌肉抽搐；性情古怪的人；蠢人；急拉 vi. 痉挛；急拉；颠簸地行进 vt. 猛拉 同义词:ass, nong, sweep, hoick He carefully jerked a big fish out of water.他小心翼翼地将一条大鱼猛地拉出水面。
n. 附件；围墙；围场 同义词:attachment, attached sheet The enclosure of Norland Common, now carrying on, is a most serious drain .现在正继续进行着的诺兰德公地的圈地，是一个最沉重的负担。
adj. 频繁的；时常发生的；惯常的 vt. 常到，常去；时常出入于 同义词:confirmed, continual, resort to to frequent the theater戏院的常客
n. [化工] 反应器；[核] 反应堆；起反应的人 Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules .在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。
n. 慷慨，大方；宽宏大量 同义词:liberality, large-handedness Their generosity is putting an additional burden on their limited resources .而他们的慷慨也成为有限资源的额外负担。
n. 激动；搅动；煽动；烦乱 同义词:warmth, excitation It could trigger mass agitation for a change of government .而这有可能引发大规模动乱导致政府更迭。
n. 熔炉，锻铁炉；铁工厂 vi. 伪造；做锻工 vt. 伪造；锻造 同义词:furnace, smelter, trump up, to fake, doctor, trump up The smith forged the horseshoe with great skill.那铁匠非常熟练地锻造马蹄铁。
n. 忍耐力；忍耐；持久；耐久 同义词:staying power, patience with The running mice do have physical advantages , like better endurance and less body fat .跑步的老鼠会有体质上的优势，像是更好的耐力和更少的脂肪。
n. 火焰；热情；光辉 v. 焚烧；泛红 同义词:passion, fire, warmth, set on fire The fire flamed intensely.火烧得很旺。
vt. 指定；指派；标出；把…定名为 adj. 指定的；选定的 同义词:specify, ticket, name, appoint, assigned, named, appointed She designated the place where we were to meet.她指定了我们将会面的地点。
n. 知觉；[生理] 感觉；看法；洞察力；获取 同义词:consciousness, viewpoint, sense, feel, insight Her perception of the right seemed almost intuitive .她对正确事物的理解几乎是直觉的。
n. 罚款，罚金；处罚 同义词:fine, amercement The penalty for helping Jews was instant execution .帮助犹太人的面临的处罚是立即处决。
n. 违反；妨碍，侵害；违背；强奸 同义词:intervention, prevention, infringement, breach This caused concern about a possible violation of ethics in his work.这就引起了大家对他违反职业道德的关注。

n. 秒；第二名；瞬间；二等品 vt. 支持 adj. 第二的；次要的；附加的 num. 第二 adv. 第二；其次；居第二位 同义词:moment, breath, instant, encourage, back, carry, champion, support of, additional, attached, supporting, minor, peripheral, next When he joined in the boxing I used to second him.在他参加拳击比赛期间，我一直是他的拳击指导。
conj. 然而；鉴于；反之 同义词:however, while, nevertheless, but, yet Whereas the following incidents have occurred.鉴于下列事实已经发生，…
n. 降落伞 vi. 跳伞 同义词:chute, to bail out Supplies were dropped by parachute .供应品用降落伞空投。
n. 物质；实质；资产；主旨 同义词:matter, asset, essence, truth, texture Mercury is a fluid substance .水银是流体物质[流质]。
n. 冲压机；打洞器；钻孔机 vt. 开洞；以拳重击 vi. 用拳猛击 同义词:blanking press, drilling machine, jab to punch holes in a sheet of metal在金属板上冲孔
n. 娱乐；消遣；休养 同义词:entertainment, pleasure, sport, occupation, amusement My only recreation has been watching TV .我惟一的娱乐就是看电视。
n. 票；入场券，标签；（美）候选人名单；证明书；交通罚款单 vt. 加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单 同义词:label, tag, co-opt, to assign Have they ticketed the merchandise?他们给商品加标签了吗?
adj. 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的 同义词:testing, embarrassed It is an identity that revolves around neutrality , and, yes , an awkward tradition of citizens' referendums .这是一个徘徊在中立周围的身份，也是一个对公民公投尴尬的传统。
adj. 单数的；单一的；非凡的；异常的 n. 单数 同义词:remarkable, extraordinary, novel, wonder, exquisite One boy " is singular ; " two boys " is plural .“一个男孩”是单数；“两个男孩”是复数。
